name: Open Systems Specialists Ltd.
tag_list: oss, hardware, software, open-source, unix, linux, storage, infrastructure
overview:
OSS is New Zealand’s leading independent provider of standards-based enterprise IT infrastructure and services. 100% locally owned, OSS works with its clients and partners to select, design, implement and support strategic computing infrastructure based on standards-based components and industry best practice.

Over the last twelve years OSS has built a reputation for quality expertise, service and solutions, and our client base includes some of New Zealand’s biggest organisations. Initially based in Auckland, OSS has grown to serve clients in Wellington, Christchurch, and throughout NZ.

Our highly experienced team includes some of New Zealand’s foremost experts in their fields, which include:

* Unix and Linux
* Open Source Software
* Storage and Backup
* Virtualisation
* Oracle, RAC and other databases
* Networking
* Security
* Clustering and High Availability
* Directories and Identity Management
* Collaboration and Messaging Systems
